featured.text: The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.

definition.zh_def: 幼蟲，指昆蟲或其他無脊椎動物在成長過程中的早期階段，通常與成蟲形態不同。
definition.en_def: The immature form of an insect or other invertebrate, typically differing greatly from the adult form.
definition.example: The larvae of the butterfly are often found feeding on leaves.
